titleStmt.title: News from Ireland, touching the damnable design of the papists in that kingdom to forge a sham-plott upon the Presbyterians being the declaration of William Smith Gent. maintaining his late evidence against St. Lawrence, a Popish priest, who would have suborn'd him to have sworn the same.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
